name: Mr Games Fall
description:
Intro:

Welcome to the life of Mr. Games Fall. One day our protagonist was looking for his cat in the mountain when he slipped and fell. This is his story. 

Controls:

Moving - W A S D

Background:

As every year, I try myself in something new. This year it was the engine and the art style. I used Godot and pushed myself with pixel art. I got some room for improvements here, but It was an exciting journey, and I want to accomplish another project with the engine that I am also going to release - a little project. But at least I have SOUNDS this year! The very first LDJam game from me with sounds! Goal accomplished!
